Posts.Content: Hi Katrina thanks so much for taking the time to write about things that may or maynot happen .  Its is such a learning curve and the not knowing is very odd I am keeping a diary that hopefully will help but buzzing at the moment that only was poorly for a couple of days mmmmmmm nope like this for round two but I doubt it. Yeah the hair loss is the next HUGE step and every morning even though only been 5 days keep looking at hair and touching it!!!! i do want to cut it to a number two or something the day is starts to come out but going to be a hard few days when it all happend but upwards and onwards.  Thanks again and any more tips or advice will be gratful. thank you fiona x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: hi I am ok its day 6 today of first lot and feel well just get very very cold and cant warm up until have a red hot bath,  feel very spaced out every now and again its as if someone has injected me with something to wipe me out mmmmm then again they have.  I have also been having daily injections for 5 days to boost immune system and I have been juicing lots of green veg like spinage brocolli mixed with pineapple and other things drinking that as many times as I can to get iron into myself. Yeah feel like got of first round quite light apart from sickness but two weeks to go for round two. fiona x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: oh so sorry about eyebrows its shit sometimes eh and so so soon.  Keep that mascara on and  hope for the best.  I am having next lot (2nd) this thur..........fingers crossed. hope all you guys are ok!!! x x x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: hello all well had 3rd chemo (sorry Oldhat 11th was the 11th march for chemo) been so so tired and just slept since thur all day and night until sat morning when woke but still was so sleepy druged up feeling never felt like it before but had a family do lunch time so had a stong coffee red bull and lucozade which all worked wonders!!!! and stayed awake all day lol lol.  have to have ct scan didnt ask why .....head all over place maybe to see if all has gone!!!! what do you thing had one after op and just showed traces in nodes in neck do maybe for that.  I have been having blood taken day before treatment but after 5 attemps to get blood veins not too good will have blood taken same day as chemo wont wait that long as lucky to be in the Christies unit at Oldham breast clinic all very fast which is good not a lot of hanging around.  well that is 3rd fec over and the nasty Texatere to come for the final three I am worried as doesnt sound nice at all .........................bones joints aching like mad nails falling off!!! its such a shame our bodies and minds and been through so much hell and more to come!!!! but one less each day eh girls and holiday and weddings and good time to be had by summer!!!! x x x  love to you all x hope typing not that mad lol x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: Hi Oldhat sorry to hear you been little weepy etc etc it is such an emotional time going through all this chemical shite!!!! but there will be light at the end and a MASSIVE party for us all. I am too to start 3 x Taxotere starting the 1st april and am very anxious about it as been told it is the strong one and having had 3 fec and have really been not as bad as I though.  I thought the worse senario on each occasion and imagined to me bed ridden but have been ok only a few days of tiredness and one sick day off the first lot even go to work as and when on a normal week as I call them.  so for the nurse to say only people with problems go on here is rubbish we ARE ALL going through this togethe and no matter how fan family and friends are there are only is woman an here that can totally understand.  I find that the nurses only seem to tell you tiny bits of information as in mmmm some people are sick some are not some people sail through some dont, so really it doesnt help at all.  I value everyones comments on how they feel and tips for getting us through the side effects ie. lollies for sponge mouth day the nurses have not gone through chemo so dont know about these fab tips we have found out ONLY be being on this site.  Oh another one i read about is licorice (ha ha check my spelling out) is good for mouth ulcers!!! . With regard to scar I had a lumpectomy and 25 lymph nodes removed and was told the scar would be like the crease under arm etc etc and its isnt!!!! had operation 25th nov and scar is still redish and lumpy but have been recommended Bio Oil but at the moment I cant touch the skin makes me feel sick as in why had it and what it all represents silly I know but thats just me. Going back to Taxotere think it is going to me more of a painful treatment that sick and fatigue after reading various posts on here like feels like been hit by a train and on very high painkillers - Tramadol which dont agree with me at all and after taking to some woman at the clinic who have had one session of Taxotere even to just vac up is such a painfull experiance so think we are on for a hard time BUT PLEASE ,NEED TO KNOW THE WORSE SITUATION for prepare myslef and anything else is a bonus.  Oh yes the nails as well after reading on here to nails will fall off most of them and asked nurses and they said oh only very very exterme cases which is crap as after reading on here thats not the case so dark nail polish is on hand for that too. I do find some days hard with having what we have or had should I say I am only 41 and have two fab girls age 2 and 9 I find it sad for them to see their mummy go through all this but time is going fast and mid May is final chemo then three weeks of radion and then 5 years of medication!!!!! but as long as it kills and stops the cancer thats the main think. Well its a horrible rainy day today so the cinema it is i think!!!! have a lovely weekend all and everyday brings you closer to the end of treatment . fiona x x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: oh so sorry to hear about hair...............!!!! every morning i think will it be today?!!!! i think that will be a huge hurdle to get through, all family keep saying to me "but it will grow" and i think SHUT UP its my hair and a big part of me especially as i wont leave the house without lipgloss on ha ha!!!! dreading it really but hope look like demi moore and not like kojak!!!! i have two wigs and HATE them think its what the stand for but got lots of hats and some trendy scalfs and maybe a sprinkle of body glitter and out i pop!!!!!! take care xxx
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: Hi Noj Please tell me more about docetaxel as I am having that after 2 more fec and the more experiances I hear the better it is to be prepared I think. did you hair come back a different colour and curly or as before? no hair loss yet still waiting fiona x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: Hello everyone Nice to be able to relay and talk in here it does help so much.  sorry to hear a few of you have been tearful I think we all sometimes forget what we are all actually going through after going to hell and back after diagnoses like all of us I think and then operation of whatever we have the chemo just seems to hopefully be an end to this horrible blip in our lives.  I am buzzing at the moment but just glad first lot wasnt as bad as i thought its the here it comes again think though isnt it.  Like  a few of you have said the tired thing is unreal you cant really explain the feeing to anyone unless they have been through it.  Hair is cut to a number one now and is coming very sparse indeed still wear hat when outside but for me holding head hair and un natural is working and making the process of this shite not as bad as long as I feel good get the old false tan slapped on and the mascara as much as I can until they bloody fall out and go out in the world shouting look at me!!!! i am beating this!!!!! but yes have round two this thursday and its just the unknow will it be the same will the effects be different.  Thanks for advice on cold lollypops will try that one out, One day nearer to getting better eh take care ladies x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: Hello   Thanks for info about Breast cancer and links etc Noj. I too have been recommended something which is a natural boost that has been recommended by a friend of a friend on web site below, then click cancer help (info below) I bought the liquid form of this as didnt want to drink the tea, dont get me wrong it tastes horrible!!!!! but just have drink of juice or milk straight after.  I have only been taking it for a week so cant judge just yet, but like i said a friend of a friend took it all the way through chemo and blood count was always excellent and she felt fab most of her treatment so i thought give it a go!!! ~~~~~~~~ This potent herbal remedy has been used for centuries as a treatment for cancer by the indigenous Indians of North America. A nurse, Rene Caisse, was given the formula by an elderly patient who had recovered years earlier from breast cancer. Nurse Caisse (Essiac in reverse) developed it and for nearly 60 years ran a nationally celebrated cancer help clinic in Bracebridge, Ontario, treating thousands of patients successfully, refusing to accept any payment. This is the authentic herbal recipe prepared as Rene Caisse advised (beware of expensive imitations!), keeping alive her dedicated work. The special mixture of these four herbs: organic Sheep sorrel, Burdock root, Turkey rhubarb root and wild crafted Slippery elm is found by some to be effective in oxygenating and purifying the blood, stimulating new cell growth and strengthening organs. Can also be used as a preventative. www.sulis-health.co.uk ~~~~~~~~ I have also been juicing a bag of spinage with pineapple every few days and drink it all  to boost iron intake for blood etc sounds vile but tastes nice but is very green ha ha. Since having 2nd chemo been feeling brilliant dont know if it is that but been feeling good!!!. Bye for now Fiona x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: Hi Katie and all Well day 10 here abd waiting for the hair thing everyone at hospital said any day now so its just a horrible waiting game I had it cut in a short bob at xmas which was a shock to me so god help me the necxt step.  As soon as any signs of hair I am having my friend around who is a hairdressers with her clipers and get a number well dont know really should it me a one two of three!!!!! does every but of hair come out as saw a llady having chemo and she looked like a little baby bird with little tufts all iover and she was on 3rd course.  I want it to happen as cant keep thinking is it today!!!!! cant help touching hair all the time its so odd. thanks for advise on ponytail feeling know it very well ha ha how long does it last the sore head?!!! Just started with a tender mouth today only got one ulcer but mouth feels strange. love to all x x and please keep posting things all helps me so so much x x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: Hi andrea and ladies i have been told my a few ladies that black nail polish may stop the nail falling off something to do with sunlight and the nail I mentioned this to chemo nurse she just laughed and said it will stop people noticing the colour change in nails and the nails coming away from nail bed!!!! but think going to try it, nothing to lose.  Also noticed a couple of people have mentioned cool gloves is this also like cold cap for nails?!!!! well its bad enough having no hair thining lases etc as well as no nails!!! is there anything else that we will have to face??????????/
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: Hello wonderful ladies!!!!! Well cold all gone apart from little sniffle but feeling brilliant today thank goodness back to old self (well chemo good old self ha ha) even off to the pub tonight with friends and family for a couple of well deserved drinks!!! Hi Lou (Cheadlel) glad you been ok on toxotere sounds like hell when reading some posts so pleased you doing good - keep me posted as I am dreading it but hey go with the flow eh.  Bikini mmmmm yes told I would be able to sunbathe but dont think allowed to sit in the full sun all day and everyday as before as skin ment to be little sensitive after chemo and will only be 3 months after finishing treatment but since a sun worshiper before a little shade wouldnt do me too much harm and yes shopping for lots of new "sensible" bikinis ha ha thats a laugh eh but has to be done! also cant ever go topless so all covered up for us eh?!!!! you will laugh when was told about having chemo (as mentioned love the sun and sunbeds) I asked breast nurse "can I go on a sunbed while having chemo" well she went mad and told me I will never go on a sunbed ever!!! hard for me as once a week for years!!!! I know its vain etc but had to ask question since having bald head and have been au natural all the time apart from cold weather wants a brown head so all out of a bottle now!!! Hi Taggielass - love the idea of chinese lanterns to signify treatment really good idean think i will copy you with that one!!! was planning a BIG party and get very drunk and cry and laugh and CELEBRATE!!!!!!! we have all been through so so much so YES party time x Hi Kat glad you finshed all chemo and started radio and all been ok like the sunbed thought too ha ha supose its like doing 12mins on sunbed when not been on one for a while ............ the lobster look lol, keep me posed as start mine when all chemo finshed not got date yet but have to have 15 sessions . Well ladies love you and leave you have a lovely weekend and keep smiling we will all get to the end of hell together!!!! Fiona x x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: Hi Andrea. Yes you can you false tan I had lumpectomy and lymph nodes removed 25th Nov 09 and had spay tan week before xmas but just covered under arm and bust with a LARGE plaster as breast nurse said due to scar still very red etc not got idea to get tan on the area as may get an alergic reation.  Since then though use false tan all the time.................cant have a bald head and not look brown and glowing ha ha people might thing its so vain but hey havent we girls been through enough.  Did get a funny reaction to one flase tan though and came out in red itchy spots on head for a week not nice but all cleared up within a few days so would get a patch test first. Well chemo from hell (toxotere) this thur 1st april ohhhh what a nie easter pressie eh!!! SO PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE keep me posted of the hell I am in for ha ha. Love to you all and keep strong fiona x x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: had first course of FEC 28th jan and felt and was sick for one day and very very exhausted until saturday not feel ok!!!!! feel so happy not been that bad but is there more sice effects to come when immune system hits the 10days!!!! cant believe feel so good but concerned there is more to come.  I do think the more chemo I have the worse the side effects will be or am I one of the lucky ones (for now) any advice please x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: hi katie  yeah all like you for tingle bum etc ha ha!!!! and mild constipation but all ok now just feel a bit dazzed and spaced out today day 5 but PLEASE keep me posted on your side effects  very helpful  take care everyone x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: Hi katie54 Thank goodness you replied. I too have a spongy feel to more and one ulcer not sore but tender and food doesnt taste the same no metal taste but certain things taste like rubber!!!!! and this morning glands are sore feels like a sore throat with the throat ha ha took temp as was a bit worried but ok.  Good luck with 2nd lot and PLEASE let me know how you are!!!! next lot for me is 18th feb but go for a heart scan later today cos of chemo but not worried I am youngish and fit just a precaution isnt it. thinking of you and get that bowl ready x x x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: Hi Noj and all you other fab ladies out there Thanks for info on Toxatere I know everyone is so different etc but nice to know what are side effects may lie ahead. Had 2nd Fec on 18.2 and been normal!!!well normalish no sickness at all or sick feeling just one day of being tired which was the 21/2 day 4 and been brill apart from that.  Got that spongy mouth going on but no ulcers oh yes and the number two cut is now bald so head very very cold.head but all good for now 3rd lot on 11th March hope will be the same but doubt it. Hope you all stil smiling x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: Hello everyone!!! Well feeling amazing and have done for past couple of days unreal feeling!!! as day 15 now hair started to fall out day 13 so got clippers on and down to a number one!!!! feel like a little elf with my pointed ears but dont feel sad or upset as thought i would was dreading this day for such a long tike but now feel like a trendy punk!!!! just so so cold even been sleeping in a wooley hat ha ha dont like wigs so been wearing hats and au natural around Asda and TX maxx and going to local later just with my ultra short hair,...................hold that head up hair eh ladies!!!!!!! no hope others read this as there is such good feelings coming from bad!!!! thinking of all week three next week and all starts again second cylce 18/2/09!!! x x x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: yes would like to thank you all for words of wisdom and just being there for all of us.......................yeah long road to go down but with the help from our familes and friends and especially "you guys" which is a life line we will all get through this together. Keep coming with all the tips and experiances helps so so much. Thinking of you all x x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: Hi Bev Yes me getting all confused it is taxatere stuff will be having for last 3 chemo dont know what having for the next five years as yet though.  will be having radio for three weeks everyday as had lumpectomy and 26 nodes removed which 25 were infected!!!!!  Hi Hat  The chemo is made just for each person going off grade of cancer size age or person height weight etc it is just desiged for each individual, but then again we all in same boat battling along . Well fingers crossed all will be ok for 11th chemo day!!!! half way there though.x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: Hi all hope things are going ok with side effects and chemo etc!!! I am due to have third FEC on 11/3 feel ok about it but then will have 3 x Tamoxifen like you BEV51 how many will you have.  I have been told by chemo nurse it is a very highly toxic mix of drugs and reading some side effects doesnt sound nice.  Not looking foward to nails falling off but was told by someone to try and paint them dark and hopefully that helps. Been very normal after last chemo just have lots of spots on bald head red and sore but dont know if reaction to all flase tan keep slapping on ha ha but is sore and face is very itchy too like something is under skin all odd, eyes brows still here but they itching too so dont know if thats a sign the hair folical is dying.  had couple of days little tearful but more thinking of what is to come for the next 5 years!!! until hopefully given the all clear but who knows eh.  But like you Bev looking at booking a summer holiday start of aug and hopefully will be off to our favourite greek island of thassos but been looking at holiday insurance as have to declare breast cancer and for family of 4 looking at £150.00 a lot of money but has to be done. so yes round three on 11th march but half way there then!!!!!!! thinking of you all x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: hello everyone again Had third Fec 11th march and god have i suffered!!!! been not that bad for the first two but this one I have been so so tired just slept really since thur woke up sat feeling very depressed and fed up!!!! but each day feel little better did feel drugged up eyes rolling etc not nice and not feel ok in the mornings just so weak around teatime and again asleep by 8:00 hard work when have two kids age 9 and 2 but hey keep me going. Not had sore mouth just hitting sponge feel in mouth but nails growing like mad!!!! so so long ha ha have to make the most of them as taxatere for next three lots. cheadle - please keep me posted on your side effects i know going to feel like run over by a bus but had tramdol after operation and hated it!!! felt off head and hallucinated horrible stuff!!! but sounds like in for a rough ride. I have bee reading about dairy etc I have not been told not to eat it/cut down been eating everything as normal all food tastes the same must say never as hungry as before but need boost of chocolate every now and again which is not like me either but loosing weight like there is no tomorrow which not sure is a good or bad thing!!!! Eyes lashes and brows thinned out but very noticeable to me but nobody else can tell as did have very full lashes etc....................so when will they all go any ideas?  ohhhhh its horrible isnt it going through all this is mad enough without looking like a bloody bald alien!!!!! I am 41 and periods stopped straight after first chemo in jan - onocologist say might come back might not not a lot to tell me really. Well good luck everyone and love to all keep posting tips and advice.............one less every time eh!!!! x x x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!

Posts.Content: Hello Cheadlel, Bev, Katrina, Chrissi and everyone else!!! Hope all good for you as been readying threads big boobs pert boob fuzzy hair etc etc and just us woman making the most of this "experiance" in our lives laugh together, cry together and all get better together!!! Not been too good past week though caugh a cold and felt like the end of the bloody world!!! its only a cold kept saying to myslef but boy has it knocked me for six!!!!! but with immune system being low etc it has bound to have an effect like that but feeling better today even called into work for an hour for "normallity" . Feeling very anxious though has mentione before had 3 fec and now start 3 of the chemo from hell ha ha the toxotere so hey cheadlel PLEASE keep me posted on things to come and I know that everyone is different etc but being prepared for the worst and not getting there is a bonus but need to know got friend all sorted for dark polish for nail think ha if someone told me to walk down the street naked painted green would stop bla bla bla happening think i would!!!! Have appointment with breast clinic 6th april so going to ask them if ok to book summer hols and looking at going away hopefully first two weeks of aug abroad but have to have radiotherapy too for 3 weeks so not sure how skin will be so yes info on that too please. Party time will be here before we all know it !!!! Thinking of you all everyday!!!!  fiona x
Posts.Title: had first chemo Fec what else to come!!!
